column1: #Text=French football : Gianluigi Buffon signs one-year contract with Paris SG
#Text=Today , French - capital football club Paris Saint-Germain ( PSG ) announced the signing of Italian goalkeeper Gianluigi Buffon on a one-year contract and an option for one additional season .
#Text=40-year-old Buffon made his professional debut for Parma in 1995 at the age of seventeen .
#Text=In 2001 , Buffon moved to Juventus FC for a record fee of € 52 million , the highest transfer fee for a goalkeeper .
#Text=Since moving to Juventus , Buffon spent seventeen seasons with the Old Lady , and featured in over 650 matches for the club .
#Text=During his tenure at Juventus , Buffon won nine Italian Serie A titles and four Coppa Italia .
#Text=Buffon also won a Coppa Italia while playing for Parma .
#Text=Buffon maintained 300 clean-sheets in appearances for Juventus .
#Text=Buffon has also featured in three UEFA Champions League finals , in 2003 , 2015 and 2017 ; but lost to AC Milan , FC Barcelona and Real Madrid respectively .
#Text=In his last game for Juventus , Buffon was sent-off after receiving a red card and faces a three-match ban .
#Text=Internationally , Buffon has featured in 176 matches , the most by any player for Italy .
#Text=In 2006 , Buffon won the FIFA World Cup with the Azzuri , defeating France in the penalty shootout .
#Text=Buffon retired from international football last year , after Italy failed to qualify for this year 's FIFA World Cup .
#Text=After signing the one-year contract with PSG , Buffon said , " It is with a great feeling of happiness that I join Paris Saint-Germain .

#Text= ( ( fr))French language : ‍L’immensité de sa carrière , ainsi que sa personnalité ambitieuse , rassembleuse et élégante , en font l’un des joueurs les plus admirés et respectés du football mondial . À 40 ans , sa passion pour le football est intacte et Gianluigi a trouvé dans notre projet le cadre idéal pour se fixer des objectifs extrêmement élevés tout en transmettant son expérience , non seulement aux autres gardiens du Club , mais également à l’ensemble de nos joueurs .
